attributes.action: people with disability to be able to train/ compete out of there lockdown area.
attributes.additional_details: I feel strongly about disability athletics and mental health.
attributes.background: I want the government or parliament to agree that disability athletes should be able to train and compete out of there lockdown area.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Travel outside Very High restriction areas is discouraged but is not currently banned. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
